title: Bhajan Cafe Riga
description: Small vegetarian cafe in Art Noveau area since 2015. Makes various dishes, including cakes without egg and Indian sweets. Offers fresh squeezed juices, smoothies, coffee and tea. Breakfast menu on working days, including freshly baked stuffed Indian parathas with different kind of fillings and dips. Lunchtime deals with soup and salad, soup and main, or all three, or business brunch including soup, two main courses, salad, salad bar, dessert and water. Sunday brunch. Hosting spiritual music concerts of mantras, bhajans, Latvian folk songs and other on Fridays.
